title: POLY-PTX cotton and mirror finish polishing rings
description:
High-quality polishing rings (buffing discs) for high-gloss polishing with polishing pastes and creams on flat and uneven surfaces without scratches and streaks.
The cotton rings (impregnated) are ideal for the main polishing of non-ferrous metals such as aluminum and brass; the mirror finish rings medium (impregnated) and soft for stainless steel and the final mirror finish of non-ferrous metals.

Features:
- Material: cotton (impregnated) and, in the case of mirror finish rings, technical nonwoven
- Open folding without additional seams for ideal adaptation to the shape of the workpiece
- Dimensions: 100 x 10 mm
- Ideal speed: 1,000–3,000 min⁻¹
- Maximum speed: 5,000 min⁻¹
- 8 pieces required for a full assembly of a 100 mm spline shaft

images.description: Mirror finish result on checker plate
